facts.fact_text: Germany’s industrial production contracted more sharply than anticipated in December, snapping a three-month run of growth.

evidences.evidence_text: On the data front, Germany’s industrial production contracted more sharply than anticipated in December, snapping a three-month run of growth.

facts.fact_text: Frankfurt’s DAX 40 edged down 0.3% to below 24,400 on Friday, heading for a fourth consecutive day of losses.

evidences.evidence_text: DAX Down for 4th Day Frankfurt’s DAX 40 edged down 0.3% to below 24,400 on Friday, heading for a fourth consecutive day of losses

claims.claim_text: Subdued sentiment across European markets amid mixed corporate earnings and lingering concerns over AI-related risks.

evidences.evidence_text: reflecting subdued sentiment across European markets amid mixed corporate earnings and lingering concerns over AI-related risks.

evidence.evidence_text: Traders also continued to digest ECB President Lagarde’s remarks following Thursday’s policy decision, in which she dampened speculation of rate cuts in response to the euro's strength.
On the data front, Germany’s industrial production contracted more sharply than anticipated in December, snapping a three-month run of growth.
reflecting subdued sentiment across European markets amid mixed corporate earnings and lingering concerns over AI-related risks.
